detail_desc: Short skirt in narrow-wale cotton corduroy with embroidery. Concealed zip and button at one side. Lined.
Ballet pumps with an elastic strap over the foot and a decorative bow at the front. Satin linings and insoles and rubber soles.
A-line dress in soft jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and elastication at the top. Unlined.
Top in viscose jersey with a V-neck front and back and spaghetti shoulder straps. Jersey lining.
Jeans in washed stretch denim with fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs. Wide ribbing at the waist for optimum comfort.
Wool scarf with fringes on the short sides. Size 45x185 cm.
Short, off-the-shoulder top in a soft, ribbed cotton blend with short sleeves.
Trousers in woven fabric. High waist with pleats and a detachable tie belt, a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and a zip fly. Side pockets and tapered legs with creases.
Shorts in washed denim with a regular waist, side and back pockets, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Short V-neck dress in jersey crêpe with a narrow, detachable tie belt at the waist and 3/4-length sleeves with cuffs and decorative buttons. Unlined.
Shaping briefs in microfibre with a lined gusset, high waist with a laser-cut edge, and wide lace trims at the hems. Light shaping effect on the waist, hips and bum.
Longjohns in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
All-in-one suit in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Leggings in soft jersey with a wide panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy. The cotton content of the leggings is organic.
Shirt in sturdy denim with a collar, buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Flap chest pockets and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Leggings in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with an elasticated waist, decorative bow at the front and lace-trimmed hems.
Trainer socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend.
Short, fitted dress in velour decorated with plastic beads. Long sleeves, a cut-out section with horizontal straps at the back and a seam at the waist. Lined.
V-neck top in cotton jersey.
Blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front and short puff sleeves with narrow elastication. Seam at the hem with a flared peplum. Unlined.
Fitted body in ribbed jersey with a V-neck, lace at the front, long sleeves and press-studs at the crotch.
Long-sleeved dress in soft organic cotton jersey with a lace skirt. Round, scalloped neckline, a press-stud on the shoulders and a sewn-in bodysuit with press-studs at the crotch.
Slip-on trainers in imitation leather with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Long top in ribbed jersey made from a viscose blend with a wide neckline and long sleeves. Straight cut with high slits in the sides and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Short skirt in woven fabric with a sewn-in wrapover with ties and a concealed zip at one side. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft rib knit with long sleeves.
Three-strand metal necklace decorated with metal pendants and glass beads. Adjustable length 43-50 cm.
Scarf in a soft weave with raw edges and fringing on the short sides. Size approx. 110x200 cm.
Sleeveless dress in lace with narrow, flounce-trimmed shoulder straps that cross at the back, and a seam at the waist. Jersey lining.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Sandals with shimmering details. Ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening, heel caps that are lightly padded at the top, and a small loop at the back. Imitation leather insoles and fluted soles.
Blouse in woven fabric with a flounce-trimmed V-neck, long sleeves with elastication and a flounce at the cuffs, and a seam with a flounce at the hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Cotton jersey briefs.
Metal earrings and ear cuffs in different designs.
Short skirt in imitation leather. High waist with a press-stud, a diagonal zip down the front, one fake pocket with a flap and press-stud and one real pocket with a zip. Lined.
Short-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.

Shortie briefs in stretch fabric, reinforced at the front and lower back to support a growing tummy. High waist, lined gusset, low-cut legs and full coverage at the back. Designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin.
Scallop-edged triangle bikini top with removable inserts and ties at the back and back of the neck.
Parka in soft, washed cotton twill with a detachable hood, flap pockets and zip down the front with a chin guard. Lined.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.

High-waisted, ankle-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric. Wide panel to hold in and shape the waist containing a concealed key pocket. Sculpting seams at the back that showcase the body’s physique.
Set with a T-shirt and pair of leggings in printed cotton jersey. T-shirt with an opening and button at the back of the neck and short puff sleeves. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Hairband in woven fabric with a decorative knot at the front and covered elastic at the back.
Short dress in patterned chiffon crêpe with a heart-shaped neckline and short puff sleeves with gathers at the ends. Concealed zip at one side, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Coat in imitation suede with a faux fur lining, raw edges, concealed press-studs down the front and pockets in the side seams.
Short, straight dress in woven fabric with an opening and button at the back of the neck, frills on the shoulders and down the sides, and concealed pockets in the side seams. Unlined.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch weave with narrow notch lapels with a decorative buttonhole, a chest pocket, flap front pockets and one inner pocket. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Slim fit that tapers at the chest and waist which, combined with slightly narrower sleeves, creates a fitted silhouette.
Pull-on trousers in an airy weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist and a back pocket. Relaxed fit with tapered legs.
Shirt jacket in cotton twill with a collar, buttons down the front and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Chest pockets and patch pockets with a flap and a button.
Short skater skirt in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist and visible zip at the back. Unlined.
Slim-fit trousers in stretch cotton twill with a high waist, zip fly and button and detachable metal chain belt.

Body in woven fabric with a V-neck and wrapover bodice. Open back with a covered button at the back of the neck, long sleeves and wide cuffs with covered buttons. Seam at the hips, a lower jersey section and press-studs at the crotch.

Lightweight gilet in nylon with a filling of 70% recycled down and 30% recycled feathers. Small stand-up collar that can be folded in and secured with a press-stud to form a V-neck. Press-studs down the front and side pockets. The gilet is easy to pack into the storage bag it is supplied with. Size of storage bag: 10x22 cm.
Ballet pumps in grained leather with pointed toes and an open section at one side. Leather linings and insoles.
Thin sports trousers in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, zipped side pockets and jersey sections at the hems.
5-pocket cotton denim shorts in a slightly looser fit with an extra-high waist and a zip fly and button.
V-neck top in airy slub linen jersey. Short dolman sleeves with a slit and ties, and a straight-cut hem.
V-neck jumper in a soft knit with dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Scarf in soft, patterned satin.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and decorative rings at the sides.
Metal rings in various designs.
T-shirt in airy, softly draping Tencel™ lyocell jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Straight-cut dress in stretch jersey with a round neckline and 3/4-length sleeves. Unlined.
Vest top in soft, ribbed cotton jersey with decorative buttons at the top and an overlocked hem.
Scarf in a soft, pleated weave.
Knee-length skirt woven in an airy Tencel™ lyocell blend with a sheen. Concealed zip at the back and a flare to the hem with asymmetric seams. Unlined.

Double-breasted trenchcoat in a wool blend with a collar, shoulder tabs with a button and a loose yoke at the back and partly at the front with a button. Side pockets, a detachable belt at the waist, a tab and buckle at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Short, off-the-shoulder blouse in a crêpe weave with elastication and a frill trim at the top and 3/4-length sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.
3/4-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated waist.
Bikini briefs in soft, organic cotton jersey with a mid waist, lined gusset and medium coverage at the back.
Short chino shorts in washed cotton poplin with a zip fly and button, side pockets and jetted back pockets with a button. Slim fit.

Dungaree shorts in washed stretch denim with adjustable straps with metal fasteners and a heart-shaped chest pocket. Press-studs at the sides, a fake fly, front and back pockets, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Vest top in a soft, rib-knit viscose blend with decorative buttons down the front.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, two buttons at the top and slits in the sides.

A-line dress in a cotton weave with straps that cross at the back and can be adjusted with concealed buttons at the back. Covered elastication at the back of the waist and gathered tiers on the skirt. Unlined.
Short dress in a viscose weave with a round neckline that has an opening and a concealed button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with a drawstring and a flounce at the cuffs. Unlined.
